Detailed Description

MMTK functionality usable in DANSE.

This class maps the API to MMTK commands and executes them.

Definition at line 191 of file Mmtk.py.

def mmtk.Mmtk.Mmtk._setForcefield (    self  ) 
  

This function sets the forcefield. Because mmtk almost entirely relies on
Amber94 except for a few (one?) noble gas lennard jones potentials, we just
use an if statement.  Thus the user should either put the string 'amber94'
directly in sample.forcefields or they should put the noble gas two-atom 
potential they desire in it.
